p.d: Jamiroquai are one of the most successful British acts to come out of the nineties. They have had four UK No.1 albums and none of their albums have charted lower than No.3. 2003 saw Jamiroquai's third appearance on the Montreux stage. The band deliver a blistering two hour plus set crammed with hit singles and much loved album tracks led from the front by Jay Kay's charisma, movement and compulsory headgear.
